history.content:
Hi !

I was a bit confused about the policy for declaring CS.

CS 61A ( Pnp during spring 2020: P, my calculated grade was B)

CS 61B (Letter Grade Fall 2020 : B+)

CS 70 (Currently taking : Spring 2021)

I wanted to know if I can pnp CS 70 this semester and use the grade I would have gotten to declare. 

Also I am unable to find the policy. Would appreciate if someone could share the link.

Thanks.
history.subject: L&S Declaring CS major policy and PnP options.
